body:
I don't know what's happening but I am seeking to pull latest from `develop.` 

I did it this morning using `git pull origin develop.`

Trying again I now see:

```
[root@node103 spack]# git remote -v
origin  https://github.com/LLNL/spack (fetch)
origin  https://github.com/LLNL/spack (push)

[root@node103 spack]# git branch
* develop
  master

# On branch develop
# Your branch is ahead of 'origin/develop' by 90 commits.
#
# Untracked files:
#   (use "git add <file>..." to include in what will be committed)
#
#       etc/spack/defaults/compilers.yaml
#       etc/spack/modules.yml
#       lib/spack/docs/exts/
#       lib/spack/docs/tutorial_sc16.rst
#       lib/spack/docs/tutorial_sc16_modules.rst
#       lib/spack/docs/tutorial_sc16_packaging.rst
#       lib/spack/docs/tutorial_sc16_spack_basics.rst
#       lib/spack/spack/cmd/doc.py
#       lib/spack/spack/test/library_list.py
#       lib/spack/spack/test/util/
#       lib/spack/spack/util/module_cmd.py
#       share/spack/qa/check_dependencies
#       var/spack/repos/builtin.mock/packages/canfail/
#       var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/abyss/
#       var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/albert/
#       var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/amrex/
#       var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/andi/
#       var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/augustus/
#       var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/coinhsl/
#       var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/espresso/dspev_drv_elpa.patch
#       var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/fftw/pgi-3.3.6-pl2.patch
#       var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/gmap-gsnap/
#       var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/h5utils/
#       var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/h5z-zfp/
#       var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/ipopt/ipopt_ppc_build.patch
#       var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/libdivsufsort/
#       var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/libmatheval/
#       var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/libpsl/
#       var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/magics/no_hardcoded_python.patch
#       var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/meshkit/
#       var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/mumps/mumps-5.0.2-spectrum-mpi-xl.patch
#       var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/mumps/mumps-5.1.1-spectrum-mpi-xl.patch
#       var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/namd/
```

Why are all of these packages in `var/spack/repos` shown as untracked?
title: Class constructor failed for package 'builtin.jdk'
